Key Match Events: Jon Dagur Thorsteinsson scored the only goal for Iceland in the 12th minute
Anthony Gordon sliced his shot well over the bar
Harry Kane missed a golden chance when he shinned Cole Palmer's cross over from six yards out
Post-Match Reflections: England captain Harry Kane was disappointed with the loss
England manager Gareth Southgate played down the severity of centre-back John Stones' injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: England were booed off by some of their own fans after losing to Iceland
England's performance was described as flat and unimpressive
Others: England will face Serbia in their opening Group C match in Gelsenkirchen next Sunday
England will also have concerns over the fitness of centre-back John Stones
